name: naval
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 belonging to a country's navy, or relating to military ships: a naval officer naval forces a naval museum/battle
More examplesFewer examplesMany diplomats attended a naval review to mark the anniversary of the end of the war.Allegations of sexual harassment have led to disciplinary proceedings being taken against three naval officers.The town has a long history as a naval port.The diving school is housed in an old naval base.The smugglers were picked up by a naval vessel.
